name: Salazzle
description: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.

abilities.name: Corrosion
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
abilities.description: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be infatuated and is immune to captivate.  If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.
